mapper.select: SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages
SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages
SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_extras_primary_packages
SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_plus_primary_packages
SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_powertools_primary_packages

SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages WHERE centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages.rpm_sourcerpm like CONCAT(#{rpm_sourcerpm},'%')

SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages WHERE centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages.rpm_sourcerpm like CONCAT(#{rpm_sourcerpm},'%')

SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_extras_primary_packages WHERE centos_8_stream_extras_primary_packages.rpm_sourcerpm like CONCAT(#{rpm_sourcerpm},'%')

SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_plus_primary_packages WHERE centos_8_stream_plus_primary_packages.rpm_sourcerpm like CONCAT(#{rpm_sourcerpm},'%')

SELECT (SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1)) AS package_name , summary , pkgkey FROM centos_8_stream_powertools_primary_packages WHERE centos_8_stream_powertools_primary_packages.rpm_sourcerpm like CONCAT(#{rpm_sourcerpm},'%')
SELECT concat(NAME," ",summary) AS desc1 FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT pkgkey , SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1) AS package_file_name , (name) AS Package_name , (VERSION) AS Package_version , (`release`) AS Package_release , (arch) AS Package_architecture , SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '.', -1) AS package_type , (url) AS Homepage , (rpm_license) AS License , CONCAT(ROUND(size_package/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS Download_size , CONCAT(ROUND(size_installed/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS Installed_size FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}
SELECT description AS onlydesc FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT name, (CONCAT (CONCAT (CASE WHEN flags = 'LT' THEN '<' WHEN flags = 'GT' THEN '>' WHEN flags = 'LE' THEN '<=' WHEN flags = 'GE' THEN '>=' ELSE '-' END), "", Ifnull(version, "-"), `release` )) AS value FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_requires WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT name, (CONCAT (CONCAT (CASE WHEN flags = 'LT' THEN '<' WHEN flags = 'GT' THEN '>' WHEN flags = 'LE' THEN '<=' WHEN flags = 'GE' THEN '>=' ELSE '-' END), "", Ifnull(version, "-"), `release` )) AS value FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_provides WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT name, (CONCAT (CONCAT((CASE WHEN flags = 'LT' THEN '<' WHEN flags = 'GT' THEN '>' WHEN flags = 'LE' THEN '<=' WHEN flags = 'GE' THEN '>=' ELSE " " END)), "", ifnull(VERSION, "-"),"-", `release` ) )AS value FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_conflicts WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT name, (CONCAT (CONCAT((CASE WHEN flags = 'LT' THEN '<' WHEN flags = 'GT' THEN '>' WHEN flags = 'LE' THEN '<=' WHEN flags = 'GE' THEN '>=' ELSE '' END)), "", Ifnull(VERSION, "-"),"-", `release` )) AS value FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_primary_obsoletes WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}
SELECT (CONCAT(dirname, '/', filenames)) AS path FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_filelists_filelist WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}
SELECT (concat(FROM_UNIXTIME (a.date,'%Y-%m-%d')," " , author , "\n " , changelog, " " )) AS changelog FROM centos_8_stream_appstream_other_changelog a WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey} ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT concat(NAME," ",summary) AS desc1 FROM centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}

SELECT pkgkey , SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '/', -1) AS package_file_name , (name) AS Package_name , (VERSION) AS Package_version , (`release`) AS Package_release , (arch) AS Package_architecture , SUBSTRING_INDEX(location_href, '.', -1) AS package_type , (url) AS Homepage , (rpm_license) AS License , CONCAT(ROUND(size_package/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS Download_size , CONCAT(ROUND(size_installed/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS Installed_size FROM centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}
SELECT description AS onlydesc FROM centos_8_stream_baseos_primary_packages WHERE pkgkey = #{pkgkey}
